summary.para: Reports info about the lifetime of an object or objects.

param.name: apiid
param.para: The globally unique identifier (GUID) of the object or objects to get info about. Use one of the DXGI_DEBUG_ID GUIDs.

param.name: flags
param.para: A -typed value that specifies the amount of info to report.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful; an error code otherwise. For a list of error codes, see DXGI_ERROR.

remarks.para: Note This API requires the Windows Software Development Kit (SDK) for Windows 8.

summary.para: This interface controls debug settings, and can only be used if the debug layer is turned on.

remarks.para: This interface is obtained by calling the function.
